product_overview: This frontend application built with Next.js offers a seamless user experience covering authentication, company data management, a public home page, and a blog. It integrates with backend APIs and includes reusable UI components and theming capabilities to ensure consistency and scalability.
core_goals: Provide secure and reliable user authentication and session management.
Enable logged-in users to efficiently manage their company-related data.
Deliver a user-friendly public home page that communicates the application's value.
Offer an engaging blog section for visitors and users to access content.
Integrate robustly with backend APIs to fetch and update data.
Maintain a consistent and scalable UI using reusable components and theming.
key_features: User authentication handling login, registration, and session management via NextAuth.js.
Company management features accessible to authenticated users for managing data.
Public home page serving as the main landing page for visitors.
Blog section showing posts and related content powered by content files.
API integration using Axios or Fetch with custom hooks and providers.
Reusable UI components for core functionalities, data display, feedback, forms, layout, themes, and utilities.
Application-wide theming and global styles with Tailwind CSS and CSS Modules.
Middleware for request processing and handling.
user_flow_summary: New users can register an account and authenticate themselves.
Authenticated users can log in and manage their company information.
Visitors can access the public home page to learn about the application.
Visitors and users can read blog posts to stay informed.
The app retrieves data from backend APIs securely and efficiently throughout user interactions.
validation_criteria: User authentication processes are secure and sessions are managed correctly.
Company data management features function correctly for authorized users only.
Public home page content is accurate and accessible for all visitors.
Blog posts load correctly and reflect the latest published content.
API integrations handle data fetching, errors, and updates reliably.
UI components render consistently with the intended design and responsiveness.
Theming applies correctly across all components and pages.
Automated tests cover key functionalities ensuring regressions are minimized.
